name: UpdateConfluentAccount
description:
Updates the Confluent account details.

Use this tool to update the details of a Confluent account by providing the account ID. It ensures the account information is current and accurately reflects any required changes.

parameters.name: confluent_account_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Confluent account to be updated.

parameters.name: confluent_api_key
parameters.description: Provide the API key associated with your Confluent account.

value_schema.description: The API key associated with your Confluent account.

parameters.name: confluent_api_secret
parameters.description: The API secret for the Confluent account. Required to authenticate and update the account details.

value_schema.description: The API secret associated with your Confluent account.

parameters.name: api_type
parameters.description: Set this to `confluent-cloud-accounts` to specify the JSON:API type for the update request.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `confluent-cloud-accounts`.

parameters.name: tags_list
parameters.description: A list of tag strings for the account. Use single keys or key-value pairs separated by a colon.

value_schema.description: A list of strings representing tags. Can be a single key, or key-value pairs separated by a colon.
